author: sky.cactus
content: Curious on people's thoughts on the proper way to handle https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3455

author: sky.cactus
content:
Things I'm weighing (seriously):
1. I very strongly believe editors should not be censoring "bad ideas" via the EIP process.  That isn't our job, and I don't think it should be our (or anyone's) job.
2. EIP Editorial work is a time consuming process, and we are already stretched incredibly thin.
3. This particular EIP is "obviously trolling" but that is a really fuzzy line.
4. Spending time doing editorial work on obvious trolls is an attack vector against an already strained process.

author: sky.cactus
content: I won't complain if someone else closes it.  I'm pretty hesitant to close it myself though.

author: gcolvin
